<script async="" src="https://tags.refinery89.com/v2/procyclingstats.js"></script><meta name="description" content="David Cañada (born 1975-03-11 in Zaragoza, passed away 2016-05-28) was a former professional road racing cyclist from Spain, active between 1993 and 2009. His best results are winning GC Volta Ciclista a Catalunya and winning GC Vuelta Ciclista a la Región de Murcia " costa="" calid."="">

</ul></li></ul><div class="clear"></div></div><div class="page-title "><div class="main"><span class="flag es w32"></span><span class="flag es w24"></span><h1 class="">David  Cañada</h1></div></div><div class="clear"></div><div class="desktop-ad leaderbord rider"></div><div class="mob-ad leaderbord rider"></div><div class="top-cont"></div><div class="top-cont-mobile top-cont-mobile-rider"></div><div class="page-content page-object default " data-no_menu="1"><h2></h2><div class=" ">
<ul class="list horizontal fs14 circle bluelink"></ul>
<div class="left w75 mb_w100"><div class="left w50 mb_w100"><h3>Rider</h3><div class="rdr-img-cont">&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 10px; color: #999; ">©: -</span></div><div class="rdr-info-cont"><b>Date of birth:</b> 11<sup>th</sup> March 1975<br><span><b>Passed away on:</b> 28<sup>th</sup> May 2016<br><b>Nationality:</b> <span class="flag  es"></span><a class="black" href="nation/spain">Spain</a><br><span><b>Weight:</b> 65 kg &nbsp; <span><b>Height:</b> 1.76 m<br><b>Place of birth:</b> <a href="location/zaragoza">Zaragoza</a><br><div class="pps"><h4>Points per specialty</h4><ul><li><div class="bar "><div class="bg green" style="width: 17.037470725995%; height: 100%;  "></div></div><div class="pnt">291</div><div class="title"><a href="rider/david-canada/results/career-points-one-day-races">One day races</a></div></li><li><div class="bar "><div class="bg red" style="width: 100%; height: 100%;  "></div></div><div class="pnt">1708</div><div class="title"><a href="rider/david-canada/results/career-points-gc">GC</a></div></li><li><div class="bar "><div class="bg blue" style="width: 48.009367681499%; height: 100%;  "></div></div><div class="pnt">820</div><div class="title"><a href="rider/david-canada/results/career-points-time-trial">Time trial</a></div></li><li><div class="bar "><div class="bg orange" style="width: 27.634660421546%; height: 100%;  "></div></div><div class="pnt">472</div><div class="title"><a href="rider/david-canada/results/career-points-sprint">Sprint</a></div></li><li><div class="bar "><div class="bg purple" style="width: 20.843091334895%; height: 100%;  "></div></div><div class="pnt">356</div><div class="title"><a href="rider/david-canada/results/career-points-climbers">Climber</a></div></li></ul></div><div class=""></div>

class="clear"></div><div id="resultsCont"><table class="rdrResults"><thead><tr><th style="width: 11%;"><br>Date</th><th style="width: 4%;"><br>Result</th><th class="cu600" style="width: 4%;"></th><th </tbody></table><div class="rdrResultsSum"><div>0 km in <b>0</b> days | PCS points: <b></b> |  UCI points: <b></b> </div></div></div><div style="float: right; margin-top: 8px; "><span style=" font-size: 10px; color: #aaa; letter-spacing: -0.5px; margin-left: 10px;"> <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" style="width: 10px; "><g><path d="M0 0h24v24H0z" fill="none"></path><path fill="#f55733" d="M3.783 2.826L12 1l8.217 1.826a1 1 0 0 1 .783.976v9.987a6 6 0 0 1-2.672 4.992L12 23l-6.328-4.219A6 6 0 0 1 3 13.79V3.802a1 1 0 0 1 .783-.976z"></path></g></svg> = number of kilometres in a group before the peloton</span></div><div class="clear"></div></div><div class="right w25 mb_w100"><div class="mt30"><h3>Key statistics</h3>

<tr><td class="season  ">2001</td><td class="bar  "><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left green2" style="width: 1.5%;  height: 12px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 12px; ">10</span></div></td><td class="ac  ">1247</td></tr>
<tr><td class="season  ">2000</td><td class="bar  "><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left green2" style="width: 80%;  height: 12px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 12px; ">522</span></div></td><td class="ac  ">95</td></tr>
<tr><td class="season  ">1999</td><td class="bar  "><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left green2" style="width: 11.6%;  height: 12px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 12px; ">76</span></div></td><td class="ac  ">470</td></tr>
<tr><td class="season  ">1998</td><td class="bar  "><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left green2" style="width: 6.1%;  height: 12px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 12px; ">40</span></div></td><td class="ac  ">576</td></tr>
<tr><td class="season  ">1997</td><td class="bar  "><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left green2" style="width: 15.9%;  height: 12px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 12px; ">104</span></div></td><td class="ac  ">363</td></tr>
<tr><td class="season  ">1996</td><td class="bar  "><div class="barCont"><div class="bg left green2" style="width: 0.5%;  height: 12px;  "></div><span style="color: #999; font-size: 10px; padding-left: 3px; line-height: 12px; ">3</span></div></td><td class="ac  ">1111</td></tr>
</tbody></table></span></div>
</div><div class="clear"></div><script>
$(document).ready(function(){
  var id = 117660; 
  var natid = 3200640; 
  var cxid = 0; 
  var seo = 'david-canada';
  var sort = 'date'; 
  var pid = '1238'; 
  var discipline = 'road'; 
  var subpath = '';   
    
  $(document).on('click', '.toggleDiscipline', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();        
    discipline = $(this).attr('data-discipline');
    id = $(this).attr('data-rid');
    console.log('dis: '+discipline+', id: '+$(this).attr('data-rid')+', season: '+$(this).attr('data-season'));
    $('.rdrSeasonNav').hide();
    $('.rdrSeasonNav[data-discipline="'+discipline+'"]').show(); 
    $(".rdrSeasonNav li").removeClass('cur');
    $(".rdrSeasonNav li[data-season="+$(this).attr('data-season')+"]").addClass('cur');
    var url = 'rider/'+seo+'/'+discipline;
    //history.pushState("string", "page", url);  
    $(this).parents('ul').find('li').removeClass('cur');
    $(this).parent('li').addClass('cur'); 
    //console.log(subpath);
    $.ajax({  method: "POST", url: subpath+"rdr/start3.php", data: { getresults: 1, id: id, natid: natid, cxid:cxid, sort: sort, pid: pid, discipline: discipline, season: $(this).attr('data-season') }  }).done(function( response ) {     $('#resultsCont').html(response);      })  
  });   

  $(document).on('click', '.seasonResults', function(e){
    e.preventDefault();       
    var season = $(this).attr('data-season');  
    
  
    $("#resultsCont").html('<br /><div class=\"loading\"> loading results ..</div>');
    var url = 'rider/'+seo+'/'+season;
    history.pushState("string", "page", url);  
    $(".rdrSeasonNav li").removeClass('cur');
    $(".rdrSeasonNav li[data-season="+season+"]").addClass('cur'); 

    $.ajax({  method: "POST", url: subpath+"rdr/start3.php", data: { getresults: 1, id: id, natid: natid, cxid:cxid, season: season, sort: sort, pid: pid, discipline: discipline  }  }).done(function( response ) {   
    	//console.log(response);
      $('#resultsCont').html(response);      
    })
     
  });    
    
  $(".sortByResults a").click(function(e){
    e.preventDefault();        
    var season = $(".rdrSeasonNav li.cur").attr('data-season');
    $("#resultsCont").html('<br /><div class=\"loading\"> loading results ..</div>');
    $(".sortByResults a").removeClass('cur');
    $(this).addClass('cur');
    sort = $(this).attr('data-case');
   // console.log('dis: '+discipline+', season: '+season+', sort: '+sort+', cxid: '+cxid+', natid: '+natid+', id: '+id);
   
    $.ajax({ method: "POST", url: subpath+"rdr/start3.php", data: { getresults: 1,id:id, natid: natid, cxid:cxid, season: season, sort: $(this).attr('data-case'), pid: pid, discipline: discipline  }  }).done(function( response ) {    $('#resultsCont').html(response);   }) 
  }); 

});
</script>

</div>
<div class="desktop-ad below-content rider"></div><div class="mob-ad below-content rider"></div></div><div style="clear: both; "></div>  
  </div>
